entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe and Goyle gave their usual grunts of laughter

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Crabbe and Goyle gave their usual grunts of laughter

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Something collided hard with Harry’s shoulder

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A split second later he realized that Neville had just charged past him

relationships.description: Harry leapt forward and seized the back of Neville’s robes
Ron hurried forward and seized Neville’s arms
Crabbe and Goyle were now flexing their arms, closing in front of Malfoy
